price: 26. Yalli qcllittam yaaxigiiy, isih qellisem num mayaybulla.
arabic: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ʿālimu al-ghaybi falā yuẓ'hiru ʿalā ghaybihi aḥadan
